explanation: [0-0] A blue broken lighter lies quietly on the ground covered with pine needles and fallen leaves, as a person in sneakers approaches from a distance. In the background are some green plants.

[0-5] Then the girl stops in front of the lighter, bends down, reaches out her left hand and picks up the broken lighter from the ground. Then, the scene shifts to another scene, where she stands up, holding the lighter in her hand, looking at it with determination, then sliding the metal flint wheel on the lighter to spark.
